law.catch_line: Activities conducted under this title are allowed notwithstanding the provisions of Title 12, Subtit...

text.section: Activities conducted under this title are allowed notwithstanding the provisions of Title 12, Subtitles 1 and 2 of this article.
A county may not issue a commercial bingo license under this title or under any public local law to an entity that was not licensed to conduct commercial bingo on or before June 30, 2008.
